column1:
ECOG_v1
#Inclusion
(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

(ecog[‘ecogdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(30) ) AND (ecog[‘ecogdate’] <= treatments['startdate'] + @DAYS(7) )

MIN(ABS(ecog[‘ecogdate’] - treatments['startdate'] ))

(ecog['ecogvalue'] == 0)

Neutrophils
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

(lab['name'] == 'Neutrophil count (absolute)') OR (lab['name'] == 'Granulocytes #') 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

((lab['name'] == 'Neutrophil count (absolute)') AND (lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 1.5)) OR ((lab['name'] == 'Granulocytes #') AND (lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 0.0015))

Platelets
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Platelet count' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 100

Hemoglobin
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Hemoglobin, whole blood'

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 9

Bilirubin
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Bilirubin (Total), serum' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] <= 1.5 * lab['maxnormcleaned']

AST
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Aspartate aminotransferase (AST or SGOT)' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] <= 2.5 * lab['maxnormcleaned']

CNS_Metastasis
#exclusion
(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)
diagnosis['diagnosisdate'] < treatments['startdate']
(diagnosis['code'] == '198.4' OR diagnosis['code'] == 'C79.4')

blood_pressure_diastolic
#exclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

vitals['name'] == 'Diastolic blood pressure' 

(vitals[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (vitals[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(vitals[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

vitals['testresultcleaned'] > 100

blood_pressure_systolic
#exclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

vitals['name'] == 'Systolic blood pressure' 

(vitals[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (vitals[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(vitals[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

vitals['testresultcleaned'] > 150
